text: fried bananas in Thailand it's a street
food and it's a snack the kind of
bananas that we use for this dish is
called blue enum wah
I can't find them here in Vancouver the
plantains make a great substitute cut
off the top and the bottom run my knife
along this side here comes out pretty
easily once you've done that there you
go like that so now we're gonna mix the
batter I've got some rice flour in here

powder some salt secret ingredient for
this shredded coconut i rehydrated this
with about a couple tablespoons of hot
water and toasted sesame seeds just some
water and give this a stir fry these at
325 I want to give the batter enough
time to dry out and become crispy should
take you about 4 to 5 minutes you
actually want a deep brown color for
this check out these beautiful pile of
plantains these stray bits of batter
don't throw this out this is like good
stuff listen
